backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the lottery system, defining all core types (UserRecord, LotteryPool, Ticket, WalletTransaction, etc.) and mixing in authorization and blob storage functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (admin login page, session token storage, navigation links, etc.) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted catalog of brief summaries for each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key implementation details of each page, hook, and component.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens in both light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application file configuring TanStack Router with all user and admin routes, auth/admin guards, error boundary, and the root layout with Navbar and ProfileSetupModal.
frontend/src/components/AdminActionLogsT: React component that fetches and displays a sorted table of admin action logs (block, unblock, role change) with badges, timestamps, and a loading skeleton state.
frontend/src/components/BlockUserModal.t: A modal dialog that allows admins to block a user with an optional reason, using the `useBlockUser` mutation hook and displaying success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: A countdown timer component that calculates and displays days/hours/minutes/seconds remaining until a target bigint timestamp, updating every second and showing urgent styling under 1 hour.
frontend/src/components/CreatePromotionD: A dialog form for creating new promotions with fields for type, description, discount/bonus amounts, and start/end times, conditionally showing fields based on the selected promotion type.
frontend/src/components/CreditCoinsModal: A modal form that lets admins credit a coin amount (with optional description) to a specific user via the `useGrantAdminBonus` mutation, including quick-amount buttons and balance display.
frontend/src/components/EditPromotionDia: A dialog for editing an existing promotion's description, discount percent, bonus amount, and start/end times, pre-populating fields from the promotion prop and submitting via `useUpdatePromotion`.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Exports a configurable spinning loader component in three sizes and a full-page `PageLoader` wrapper centered on the screen.
frontend/src/components/LotteryCard.tsx: Displays a lottery's details (name, prize pool, ticket price, fill progress, draw time) in a card, using live stats from `useGetLotteryLiveStats` and badge labels derived from the draw interval.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with Internet Identity login/logout, dynamic nav links based on auth state, coin balance display, and an admin panel link for admin users.
frontend/src/components/NumberPicker.tsx: A digit-by-digit number input component that renders individual character inputs with keyboard navigation, backspace handling, paste support, and visual grouping separators.
frontend/src/components/PaymentProofUplo: A drag-and-drop or click-to-upload image component that converts a selected PNG/JPG file to base64 and displays a preview with a clear button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects a new user's display name and email, then calls the backend to save their profile, with error handling for uninitialized accounts.
A styled banner component that displays promotion details (type, discount, bonus, description, end date) with type-specific icons, labels, and color themes.
frontend/src/components/QuickCreditCoins: An admin card component with a searchable user selector and amount/description fields that allows instantly crediting coins to a selected user via the grantAdminBonus mutation.
frontend/src/components/TicketCard.tsx: Renders a styled card for a single lottery ticket, showing ticket number, purchase date, and winner status with prize amount and a link to results.
frontend/src/components/ToastContainer.t: Displays a fixed-position stack of toast notifications (success, error, info) sourced from ToastContext, each dismissible via a close button.
frontend/src/components/TransactionRow.t: Renders a single transaction row with an icon, label, amount, and date derived from the transaction type, supporting types like win, buy_ticket, cashback, and more.
frontend/src/components/UnblockUserModal: A confirmation dialog that calls the unblockUser mutation to restore platform access for a specified user, showing loading state and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Provides authentication state for both Internet Identity users (profile fetching, setup flow) and an admin session (credential hashing, token storage with 8-hour expiry) via React context.
frontend/src/contexts/ToastContext.tsx: Defines a ToastContext and provider that manages a list of auto-expiring toast messages with helpers for success, error, and info variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, managing login, logout, identity persistence, and login status across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profiles, admin login, lottery pools, tickets, balance requests, promotions, and draw results. Wraps actor calls with useQuery/useMutation and handles cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Playfair Display and Inter fonts, configuring Tailwind with OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for a dark gold/charcoal theme, and defining custom animations (shimmer, float, pulse-gold) and scrollbar styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging (cn), formatting coin amounts and dates, computing human-readable time remaining, and mapping draw interval keys to labels and badge color classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AddBalance.tsx: Page allowing users to submit a coin balance top-up request by entering an amount and a payment screenshot URL, with quick-select amount buttons and a success confirmation state.
Admin dashboard showing platform stats (revenue, users, lotteries, pending approvals) and quick-action links to key admin sections, plus a quick coin credit card component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page with Admin ID and password fields, redirects to the admin dashboard on successful authentication via the AuthContext adminLogin method.
frontend/src/pages/admin/BalanceRequests: Admin page for reviewing user balance top-up requests, supporting filter tabs (all/pending/approved/rejected) and approve/reject actions with optional notes per request.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DrawDeclaration: Admin page for declaring lottery draw winners by selecting an active lottery pool and entering a winning number, then displaying the resulting winner records with rank styling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/LotteryManageme: Admin page for creating and managing lottery pools, supporting creation via a form dialog and inline status updates for existing pools.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Promotions.tsx: Admin page for managing promotions, allowing creation/editing of promotions and granting coin bonuses to specific users via a form-driven UI.
Admin page for listing, searching, blocking/unblocking users, assigning roles, and opening a credit coins modal for individual users.
frontend/src/pages/admin/WithdrawalManag: Admin page for reviewing and processing user withdrawal requests, with filterable status tabs and approve/reject actions with optional notes.
frontend/src/pages/BuyTicket.tsx: Page for purchasing a lottery ticket for a specific pool, supporting manual or auto-generated ticket numbers, displaying live stats, applicable promotions/discounts, and enforcing per-user ticket limits and balance checks.
frontend/src/pages/DrawResults.tsx: Page displaying the draw results for a completed lottery pool, showing the winning number, total tickets, prize distributed, and a ranked winners list with medal-style styling.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Marketing landing page for LuckyCoins featuring a hero section, stats banner, and feature highlights promoting the blockchain lottery platform.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page that authenticates users via Internet Identity, redirecting to the dashboard on success and showing a subtle admin portal link.
frontend/src/pages/LotteryList.tsx: Displays active lottery pools in a filterable, searchable grid with interval-based filters and skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/pages/MyTickets.tsx: Shows the authenticated user's lottery tickets with stats (total, won, winnings) and tabbed views for all, won, and pending tickets.
frontend/src/pages/Register.tsx: Registration page that uses Internet Identity to create a new account, mirroring the Login flow with a welcome-bonus callout.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionHistory.ts: Displays the user's transaction history with summary stats (winnings, spent, bonuses) and tabbed filtering by transaction type with search support.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboard.tsx: User dashboard page displaying coin balance, active lotteries count, ticket summary, and recent transaction history with loading skeletons and quick action buttons.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawalRequest.tsx: Page for submitting coin withdrawal requests via UPI or bank transfer, with balance validation, minimum amount enforcement, and a history list of past withdrawals with status badges.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Provides form validation helpers (email, password, required fields, amounts, ticket numbers) and formatting utilities for coins, dates, and a simple password hash function.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom design system with oklch-based color tokens (gold, charcoal, cream), custom fonts, shadows, border radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot describing the full-stack lottery coin system's architecture, features, known issues, and versioned feature list for a React/Node.js/MySQL application with lottery, wallet, and admin panel functionality.
